creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: intertwined couple engaged in intercourse; both are nude--woman has red fabric across her belly and beneath her; kettle and tray of food at left edge; text below woman's head
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban 色道取組十二番)
text: A couple compactly entwined, she closes her eyes in pleasure as he locks his arms together and squares his jaw in determination. Just past their heads is a sake kettle and go board with a tray of snacks and a glass goblet. In the dialogue the man says: "I can't last any longer...here I come! Do you want it'" to which she answers: "I don't know why...ah..ah..ah!"
title: Near the Go Board, No. 5 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
